item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 8, 2025 at 3:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Google to Back Three New Advanced Nuclear Projects (65 points | 37 comments)
2. 20 years to give away virtually all my wealth (132 points | 97 comments)
3. How to Harden GitHub Actions: The Unofficial Guide (100 points | 34 comments)
4. Using NASA’s SMAP satellite to detect L-band interference (232 points | 46 comments)
5. Yes, the Apple II MouseCard IRQ Is Synced to the VBL (41 points | 7 comments)
6. Ask HN: What are good high information density UIs (screenshots, apps, sites) (105 points | 84 comments)
7. Mycoria is an open and secure overlay network that connects all participants (255 points | 102 comments)
8. How linear regression works intuitively and how it leads to gradient descent (255 points | 59 comments)
9. Will protein design tools solve the snake antivenom shortage? (19 points | 6 comments)
10. How Obama’s BlackBerry got secured (2013) (88 points | 32 comments)
11. Imagineers defend new Walt Disney robot (9 points | 1 comment)
12. Ty: A fast Python type checker and language server (823 points | 259 comments)
13. Artifact (YC W25) Is Hiring ( | hide)
14. Mass spectrometry method identifies pathogens within minutes instead of days (93 points | 30 comments)
15. Inheritance was invented as a performance hack (2021) (166 points | 169 comments)
16. Waiting for Postgres 18: Accelerating Disk Reads with Asynchronous I/O (517 points | 137 comments)
17. Heat stress mitigation by trees and shelters at bus stops (96 points | 84 comments)
18. Mistral ships Le Chat – enterprise AI assistant that can run on prem (469 points | 141 comments)
19. Trump's NIH Axed Research Grants Even After a Judge Blocked the Cuts (39 points | 13 comments)
20. June Huh dropped out to become a poet, now he’s won a Fields Medal (2022) (191 points | 116 comments)
21. QueryHub (6 points | discuss)
22. Engineered adipocytes implantation suppresses tumor progression in cancer models (14 points | discuss)
23. Bridging the gap between keyword and semantic search with SPLADE (2024) (14 points | discuss)
24. Open source Google Analytics replacement (334 points | 148 comments)
25. Huawei unveils laptop running self-developed HarmonyOS as Windows licence expire (9 points | 1 comment)
26. Create and edit images with Gemini 2.0 in preview (239 points | 97 comments)
27. Samsung is paying $350M for audio brands B&W, Denon, Marantz and Polk (191 points | 267 comments)
28. Extending a Language – Writing Powerful Macros in Scheme (61 points | 3 comments)
29. Show HN: US Routing – Python library for fast local routing in the US (107 points | 26 comments)
30. Web search on the Anthropic API (254 points | 57 comments)
